context: Me and the missus was in the back, you see, having our tea.
response: Say, what kind of a chap was he?
context/1: Nothing at all, eh?
context/4: Did you hear him come home or go into his house?
context/5: Well, you didn't hear anything at all in here?
context/7: You know, not like it ought to be.
context/8: Or anything at all out of the way?
context/9: Would you take a look about the place, see if there's anything missing?
